Name: Additional Armour Plating
Effect: Increases Armour Value by 1. Prevents further modifications. Any armour not Mesh gains the Loud trait.

Name: Auspex Array Helmet
Effect: While wearing, gain Advantage on Tests to avoid being ambushed. Can use an Action to reveal energy emissions, life signs, and movement up to Medium Range. May require Tech Test to interpret or overcome interference.

Name: Ceramite Plating & Coating
Effect: Adds +2 Armour against Flamer and Spread weapons. Grants Loud trait. Prevents further modifications.

Name: Mounted Pict Recorder
Effect: Records from front of armour piece for 10 hours. Data can be accessed via cogitator or Tech-Priest extraction. Used for evidence or analysis.

Name: Reinforced Mirror-visor
Effect: While worn, grants Advantage on Tests to resist effects causing the Blinded Condition.
